description: You are in a small, stone cell. There is a short, wooden bookshelf against the wall. On it is a stack of stone tablets carved with text in a language you do not understand. Below them, on the bottom shelf, is a wooden chest bound with iron straps. The only exit is the portal to the South.
hidden: The chest opens easily. Resting on a folded piece of red velvet is a large, emerald green gemstone. You have found the Green Gem!
